comment: * Constants to be used to play sound effects via {@link View#playSoundEffect(int)}

variables.name: NAVIGATION_LEFT
variables.comment: Effect id for a navigation left

variables.name: NAVIGATION_UP
variables.comment: Effect id for a navigation up

variables.name: NAVIGATION_RIGHT
variables.comment: Effect id for a navigation right

variables.name: NAVIGATION_DOWN
variables.comment: Effect id for a navigation down

variables.name: NAVIGATION_REPEAT_LEFT
variables.comment: Effect id for a repeatedly triggered navigation left, e.g. due to long pressing a button

variables.name: NAVIGATION_REPEAT_UP
variables.comment: Effect id for a repeatedly triggered navigation up, e.g. due to long pressing a button

variables.name: NAVIGATION_REPEAT_RIGHT
variables.comment: Effect id for a repeatedly triggered navigation right, e.g. due to long pressing a button

variables.name: NAVIGATION_REPEAT_DOWN
variables.comment: Effect id for a repeatedly triggered navigation down, e.g. due to long pressing a button

methods.name: public static int getContantForFocusDirection(@View.FocusDirection int direction)
methods.comment:
* Get the sonification constant for the focus directions.
     * @param direction The direction of the focus.
     * @return The appropriate sonification constant.
     * @throws {@link IllegalArgumentException} when the passed direction is not one of the
     *     documented values.

methods.name: public static int getConstantForFocusDirection(@View.FocusDirection int direction, boolean repeating)
methods.comment:
* Get the sonification constant for the focus directions
     * @param direction The direction of the focus.
     * @param repeating True if the user long-presses a direction
     * @return The appropriate sonification constant
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when the passed direction is not one of the
     *      documented values.

methods.name: public static boolean isNavigationRepeat(@NavigationSoundEffect int effectId)
public static int nextNavigationRepeatSoundEffectId()
methods.comment:
* @return The next navigation repeat sound effect id, chosen at random in a non-repeating
     * fashion
     * @hide

methodNames: public static int getConstantForFocusDirection(@View.FocusDirection int direction, boolean repeating)
public static boolean isNavigationRepeat(@NavigationSoundEffect int effectId)
